name: Paul Jennings
text:
Paul joined Wellington College in September 2017 having previously worked as a subject leader for Computer Science as well as a leader of teaching and learning. Paul has a keen interest in programming and is efficient in VB.net, Java and Python. Paul is a creative teacher who builds success in the classroom through developing strong relationships with the students. Paul is a Rugby coach for the Junior Colts 3rd team and a tutor at the Murray.
Paul is also an FA certified football coach and spent 5 years coaching a local youth side. Paul is married to Sophy and has two children, Lillie and George. He enjoys spending time with his family and friends, cooking and football.
